entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
